body_html:
Ok. I tried have tried on a Pascal and a Maxwell machine both with cuda 8.
Both machines fails after i upgraded to cudnn 6005 but runs fine if i change back to cudnn 5105.
The pascal machine runs ubuntu 16 and the Maxwell machine runs ubuntu 14.

I'm not very familiar with the codebase, but it seems that cudnn 6005 will use cudnn for dilations?
Could that be the problem?
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/conv.py#L81

body:
Ok. I tried have tried on a Pascal and a Maxwell machine both with cuda 8. 
Both machines fails after i upgraded to cudnn 6005 but runs fine if i change back to cudnn 5105. 
The pascal machine runs ubuntu 16 and the Maxwell machine runs ubuntu 14. 

I'm not very familiar with the codebase, but it seems that cudnn 6005 will use cudnn for dilations? 
Could that be the problem?
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/conv.py#L81
